A recent addition to this featured original art section is a special friend named Kayli.  She's been known for doing portraits for characters in Sierra's "The Realm" game.  Quite a talent indeed.  Below is a sample of her work, one of her own characters, a musically talented bard.  As with other portrait makers, the fees must be paid in platinum on the Rathe server, and are uniquely adjusted based on your level (or, in some cases, the type of armor you're wearing).  Click here to visit her site for your very own special creation..

 

This portrait is from an artist who plays EverQuest (I think anyway).  Below is a sample of a portrait created for a barbarian warrior named Winguren.  Looks to me like we have some serious talent here.  Click here to visit this new fee based portrait page and, possibly, see about getting your own portrait made.  However, since the fee is "in game" platinum, they are only accepting commissions for portraits on the Mithaniel Marr server.

The first entries to be posted here are by Raene, a wonderfully talented artist.  Below are pictures she did after taking screenshots of Matrika and myself.

Raene will be glad to make portraits similar to these for anyone, for a small fee.  Please head to her site, called Rathe Rhapsody, and visit her portraits section.  All the information you need can be found there.  And I highly recommend her.

Want your art to be featured here?  Drop me a line below with information on where I can find your pic.  You may submit them to me via e-mail, but please, only JPG and GIF formats.  Any BMP images will be promptly discarded.
